SEARCH
Package server.core.messages

Class MessageHandler

java.lang.Object
server.core.messages.MessageHandler
public class MessageHandler extends Object
The `MessageHandler` class is responsible for handling and representing messages in the server. Each message contains a message content, sender, receiver, and a timestamp.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tomasz Zbroszczyk

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the message.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
